summary: An ordinance authorizing the dismissal of suit for the condemnation, appropriation, and taking of the fee simple title to certain real estate under Ordinance No. 37320, Cause No. 123590, insofar as the same affects certain property in the Northeast quarter of the Southeast quarter of Section 5, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and authorizing and directing the corporation counsel to have judgement in said cause modified by excluding therefrom the property so dismissed.
